name: Hi Tech Robot Shoes 3D model
description:
Robots boots are designed in 3D model using Blender 3d. Inspired by Gundam and other mecha anime. These robots boots can be worn by character. It is not rigged but its cover can be opened  and closed for animation purpose.

Shader : Toon type High Poly. Not Rigged.

DISCLAIMER : You may use it for personal / games / commercial / education / or any other purpose.
